Good horror game, good ideas implemented. A very nice 4v1 multiplayer game in which you can choose from a variety of characters to play as.

Игра хорошая,лучшая в своём роде.Несмотря на это,некоторые дополнения переоценены или бесполезны,а одмены нерфят манов часто,из-за сурвов-нубов,которых,к несчастию,большинство!
гейм плей хуйня но поугарать можно с друзьями

Although the community can be quite toxic, the whole idea of the game and how it is presented is very well thought out. Most killers are fun to play as and against - and those who aren't are getting reworks.

UPDATE as of October 18th, 2021: With the direction Behaviour Interactive is going. I refuse to recommend this game to anyone. Behaviour refuses to listen to their community, they make the game so unfairly balanced, the game is riddled with so many game breaking issues that Behaviour refuses to fix, the new ranking system is a fucking mess and it's to the point that online matches are no longer fun to do anymore, so I only limit myself to playing with friends and family. They do absolutely nothing about the hackers and cheaters, they can't handle criticism and will silence anyone who criticizes them, their cosmetic prices cost wickedly expensive prices along with microtransactions up the wazoo. They think they can do whatever they want and get away with it just because they have no other competitors. And the nail in the coffin that makes me change my review to a negative review is that Behaviour Interactive approves of NFTs when they were implementing the Hellraiser Chapter into Dead By Daylight. NFTs being a scam and a cryptocurrency that damages the environment, all to make a quick buck, because Behaviour doesn't care about their fans, all they care about is money, and I will not be supporting Behaviour Interactive and will not be recommending Dead By Daylight to anyone unless this fucking greedy corporation cleans up their act. This game used to be fun back then, but now it's just a hollow shell of it's former self and a cash cow to Behaviour and nothing else.

OLD REVIEW from November 2nd, 2019: Definitely one of my most favorite games to play, especially with friends and family. I will admit matches can be frustrating, but in the end, it's only a game, and it's supposed to be challenging. I absolutely love the characters and lore to this game, and I cannot wait for further DLC in the future!

This game is actually pretty good and a bit addictive, but as all games it have it's issues. Most of them are bad hitboxes and laggy dedicated servers. You will get used to it anyways and i really recommend you try this game if you haven't already.

Game is chock full of glitches, and the developers don't listen to feedback. Report system is just there for decoration, and don't even get me started on the community itself. 100% do not recommend unless you want to go slowly insane.

I really enjoy this game.I must admit i play for a few years so long that i managed to get all leagacies and the game was kinda funner before but i would still rather pay 20 euros or so on this than on other games like CS:GO(just hackers) and other games like that so i would recomand this game!
Community riddled with some of the sweatiest angsty kids on the internet.

[PL]
Przed wprowadzeniem aktualizacji [b]6.1.0[/b] gra była świetna, spędzałem przy niej mnóstwo czasu jako ocalały, ale niestety te czasy już nie powrócą.

Jeśli grasz zabójcą, ta aktualizacja jest jak najbardziej dla Ciebie, ale dla mnie (surv main) ta aktualizacja to jeden wielki żart.

[ENG]
Before the release of update [b]6.1.0[/b], this game was great, I spent a lot of time on it as a survivor, but unfortunately those times will never come back.

If you're a killer, this update is most for you, but for me (surv main), this update is a fu**ing joke.
